nodes.excerpt: Teach without videos and zoom sessions. We enable best minds to share their knowledge in minutes. Average time to launch a course is 2 months. Launch your course under 2 minutes with Questbook. What Twitter has done to blogging, Questbook does to learning.
nodes.title: QuestBook - The fastest way to teach and learn

nodes.excerpt: Get an insightful landing page teardown every week which focuses on copywriting, user flow and placement of elements which helps you build better landing pages.

nodes.title:
I think the thing I'm most thankful for about being born in the early-1980s is we didn't have social media or cell phone cameras when I was in college

We also didn't really have Wikipedia to write papers but that seems like a fair trade to me

nodes.title:
At $7.69 trillion, the Fed's Balance Sheet hit another new high this week.

The Fed's total assets have increased $3.5 trillion since the beginning of 2020 and they have promised to keep buying bonds at a rate of $120 billion per month going forward. https://t.co/t9E12BQLjl

nodes.title: Dough Flow Club - Financial and accounting services marketplace

nodes.excerpt: Mobilo Wood Card resembles the ecological aspirations of our brand. With this brand new, one-of-its-kind, NFC-powered, smart business card, we want to provide an opportunity for companies to truly distance themselves from paper waste.
nodes.title: Mobilo Wood - Smart business card made of wood

nodes.excerpt: Vinyls is a beautiful music player built with iOS design guidelines in mind. There are no complicated user accounts or settings to configure. You can start listening to your music right away. You can scrub to seek, watch the tone arm follow the playback time.
nodes.title: Vinyls - A beautiful music player for iOS
nodes.author: JPEGuin

nodes.excerpt: Splitsub is a group buying app for online consumer subscriptions in India. Users share more than 25 different types of subscriptions ranging from streaming services to productivity softwares
nodes.title: Splitsub - Group buying app for online subscriptions
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Zealth is building a software to help hospitals provide continuous round the clock monitoring to their cancer patients, once they leave the hospital and alerts them if the patient is at high risk.
nodes.title: Zealth - SaaS for remote monitoring of cancer patients
nodes.author: Michael Seibel
